file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-05-04 - MAIN LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the spring assemblies of the main landing gear. B. These procedures are applicable to the LH and RH Main Landing Gears. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with (♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN ALL 32-10-05-000-801-A LANDING GEAR - REMOVAL SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN ALL 32-10-05-400-801-A LANDING GEAR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-05 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the spring assemblies of the main landing gear. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-33-08-000-801-A/400 MAIN LANDING GEAR ACTUATOR - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY GSE 097 Tool, Spring Mounting To Remove the Spring E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task RH or LH MLG leg I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, open the ELEC PUMP 1 circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Make sure that the safety pins of the landing gears are installed ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (3) Make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system 1 is fully released. (4) Release the pressure of the PAX Door/MLG accumulator (AMM TASK 32-33-08-000-801-A/400 - item I - preparation). (5) Install spring mounting tool GSE 097 to the springs. Refer to Figure 402. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 2 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT SPRING MOUNTING TOOL GSE 097 IS CORRECTLY ATTACHED TO THE SPRINGS BEFORE YOU REMOVE THEIR ATTACHING ELEMENTS. (1) Remove the cotter pins (1) and (12), nuts (2) and (13), and washers (3) and (14). NOTE: The safety pin of the landing gear MUST NOT be removal when you do this step. (2) Remove the cotter pin (5), nut (6), washers (7) and (9) if applicable (see flag - 4), bolt (10), and spacer (8) if applicable (see flag - 3). (3) Remove the spring assemblies (4) and (11), once at a time, together with the GSE 097. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 3 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Spring Assemblies of the Main Landing Gear - Removal/Installation Figure 401 SPRING ASSEMBLIES B A A ZONE ZONE 721 731 MLG LEG DET. A AUXILIARY BRACE STRUT 11. SPRING 10. BOLT ASSEMBLY AUXILIARY 12. COTTER PIN BRACE STRUT 9. WASHER 13. NUT 14. WASHER 3 DET. B STRUCTURE 8. SPACER (WING) 1. COTTER PIN 7. WASHER 1 1 TORQUE: 1.35 TO 1.7 N.m (12 TO 15 lb.in) 6. NUT 2 2. NUT 2 5. COTTER PIN APPLY STANDARD TORQUE UNTIL THE 3. WASHER NUT SLOT IS ALIGNED WITH BOLT HOLE 4. SPRING 3 ONLY APPLICABLE TO AIRCRAFTS: ASSEMBLY S/N: 004-009; 011; 013; 014. AND PRE-MOD SB145-32-0041. 145AMM320126.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 4 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Spring Assemblies - GSE Installation Figure 402 B A A ZONE ZONE 721 731 DET. A 11. SPRING ASSEMBLY 4. SPRING ASSEMBLY DET. B 145AMM320241.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 5 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the spring assemblies of the main landing gear. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION LANDING GEAR AND MAIN DOOR ACCUMULATOR - AMM TASK 12-13-06-600-801-A/300 CHARGE MS24665-153 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY GSE 097 Tool, Spring Mounting To Install the Spring E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Cotter pin MS24665-153 3 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task RH or LH MLG leg I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install spring mounting tool GSE 097 to the spring assemblies (4) and (11). Refer to Figure 402. (2) Put the spring assemblies (4) and (11) in their installation position between the auxiliary brace strut and the support at the aircraft structure. (3) Install the washers (3) and (14), nuts (2) and (13) and tighten. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 6 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the spacer (8) if applicable (see flag - 3), bolt (10), washers (7) and (9) if applicable (see flag - 4), and nut (6). Torque to 1.35 to 1.7 N.m (12 to 15 lb.in). (5) Install the cotter pins (1), (5), and (12). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove spring mounting tool GSE 097. (2) Pressurize the PAX Door/MLG accumulator (AMM TASK 12-13-06-600-801-A/300). (3) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the ELEC PUMP 1 circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 32-10-05 Page 7 of 7 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
